sg.edu.nus.comp.cs4218.impl.extended1

类 PipingTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • sg.edu.nus.comp.cs4218.impl.ATool
      • sg.edu.nus.comp.cs4218.impl.extended1.PipingTool
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IPipingTool, ITool

    public class PipingTool
extends ATool
implements IPipingTool
    PipingTool pipes the output of previous command to the next command as input If any of the command encounters error (i.e. exit with non-0 code), stop piping and print generated output up to that point If any of the command string given is not valid, it prints ERROR_MSG_NULL_CMD On interrupt (CTRL-Z), exit with code 0 and print generated output up to that point

    • 字段概要

      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      static java.lang.String ERROR_MSG_NULL_SHELL 
      private java.io.File pipeWorkingDirectory 

      • 从类继承的字段 sg.edu.nus.comp.cs4218.impl.ATool

        args, parent

    • 构造器概要

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String execute(java.io.File workingDir, java.lang.String stdin)
      Executes the tool with args provided in the constructor If any of the command encounters error (i.e. exit with non-0 code), stop piping and print generated output up to that point If any of the command string given is not valid, it prints ERROR_MSG_NULL_CMD On interrupt (CTRL-Z), exit with code 0 and print generated output up to that point
      java.lang.String pipe(ITool from, ITool to)
      Pipe the stdout of *from* to stdin of *to* Currently the method is not used by system execution, as the other form, pipe(String, ITool), is enough for piping ASSUMPTION: stdin for the from tool is empty
      java.lang.String pipe(java.lang.String stdout, ITool to)
      Pipe the stdout to stdin of *to* stdout becomes the stdin content of to, and the output of to is returned by the method

        Constructor

    • 方法详细资料

      • pipe

        public java.lang.String pipe(ITool from,
                    ITool to)
        Pipe the stdout of *from* to stdin of *to* Currently the method is not used by system execution, as the other form, pipe(String, ITool), is enough for piping ASSUMPTION: stdin for the from tool is empty
        指定者:
        pipe 在接口中 IPipingTool
        参数:
        from -
        to -
        返回:
        The stdout of *to*

      • pipe

        public java.lang.String pipe(java.lang.String stdout,
                    ITool to)
        Pipe the stdout to stdin of *to* stdout becomes the stdin content of to, and the output of to is returned by the method
        指定者:
        pipe 在接口中 IPipingTool
        参数:
        stdout -
        to -
        返回:
        The stdout of *to*

      • execute

        public java.lang.String execute(java.io.File workingDir,
                       java.lang.String stdin)
        Executes the tool with args provided in the constructor If any of the command encounters error (i.e. exit with non-0 code), stop piping and print generated output up to that point If any of the command string given is not valid, it prints ERROR_MSG_NULL_CMD On interrupt (CTRL-Z), exit with code 0 and print generated output up to that point
        指定者:
        execute 在接口中 ITool
        指定者:
        execute 在类中 ATool
        参数:
        workingDir -
        stdin - Input on stdin. NOT THE ARGUMENTS! Can be null.
        返回:
        Output on stdout
